lines.text: My country right or wrong, eh?
Yes. Most of them begin with that.
I'm not very good on pool tables, sir.
I'm too much of a gentleman to make the obvious comment.
A man's thought's are his own.
So long as he keeps them to himself!

You leave Earth and anything you forget to bring with you will kill you. Anything you do bring with you which doesn't work properly will kill you. When in doubt, just assume *everything* will kill you.
Some days, try as you will, nothing goes wrong.
Mix the personal with the professional, what you get are mistakes. People are part of the design plan - it's dangerous to forget that.
